version_description:
• We’ve got a redesigned and squeaky clean registration flow for new users, that should make signing up for Ibotta easier, faster, and funner. (Yep, funner.)
• Personalized recommendations for offers you might like to try—which used to live with bonuses—now have a home on retailer pages. Just go to a favorite retailer, tap the “For you” tab, and look for the section that says “Because you bought...” You’ll find offers similar to products you’ve shopped recently, but these give you even more cash back.

What’s new
• There’s a new way to submit your Walmart receipts! QR codes on Walmart receipts have been replaced with barcodes. Now when you want to redeem a receipt, scan the barcode and we’ll automatically match all offers we find. Cash money.

What’s new
• There’s a new way to submit your Walmart receipts! QR codes on Walmart receipts have been replaced with barcodes. Now when you want to redeem a receipt, scan the barcode and we’ll automatically match all offers we find. Cash money.
Sprucing, mending, correcting, patching, and otherwise doing all the little things that make getting cash back easier, better, faster, stronger.

Bug fixes
• We found a couple wonky errors with, um, error messages and un-wonked them.
• Sometimes if you added an offer to your list, the (+) icon didn’t update to a checkmark signifying that it was indeed added. We squashed that bug.
• A few more small-but-necessary fixes in the background that do things in the front...ground... like prevent the app from crashing and keep your experience snappy and smooth.

Stay safe out there, friends. We’re doing everything we can to keep Ibotta running smoothly, so you can shop the things you need to keep yourself and your family healthy.

In this release are a few important fixes that should make linking your account at retailers easier and more reliable.

These are wild and hard and unprecedented times. We’re here to help. Look to the app for offers on essentials, restaurant delivery, and take-out. Look to our emails for comforting recipes. And look to our social accounts, where heartwarming stories of people using their earnings to buy food and donate it to families that need it are being shared every day.

We're working as hard and fast as we can to make some updates to the app that will help you through this shift in how we shop—in the meantime, stay safe out there.

These are wild and hard and unprecedented times. We’re here to help. Look to the app for offers on essentials, restaurant delivery, and take-out. Look to our emails for comforting recipes. And look to our social accounts, where heartwarming stories of people using their earnings to buy food and donate it to families that need it are being shared every day.

We're working as hard and fast as we can to make some updates to the app that will help you through this shift in how we shop—in the meantime, stay safe out there.

Relatable: “My boyfriend has been wearing sweats so much he has started calling normal pants… ‘hard pants’” via @davidmackau

Helpful updates to the app that will make shopping during this crazy time easier and safer—and get you more cash back—are coming real soon. In the meantime, stay safe out there.
Sprucing, mending, correcting, patching, and otherwise doing all the little things that make getting cash back easier, better, faster, stronger.

Sprucing, mending, correcting, patching, and otherwise doing all the little things that make getting cash back easier, better, faster, stronger.

Big news, folks. You can now earn cash on grocery pickup and delivery at Walmart! Search for “Walmart Grocery” and follow the steps to link your Walmart account to Ibotta. Add offers to your list, then shop them on grocery.walmart.com or the Walmart app. You’ll get automatic cash back within 24 hours of getting your order (after you get the “Thanks for shopping with us” email from Walmart).

We hope this update makes getting your essentials safer and more convenient. Stay healthy out there!

Big news, folks. You can now earn cash on grocery pickup and delivery at Walmart! Search for “Walmart Grocery” and follow the steps to link your Walmart account to Ibotta. Add offers to your list, then shop them on grocery.walmart.com or the Walmart app. You’ll get automatic cash back within 24 hours of getting your order (after you get the “Thanks for shopping with us” email from Walmart).

We hope this update makes getting your essentials safer and more convenient. Stay healthy out there!

Have you tried earning cash on grocery pickup and delivery at Walmart yet? Just search for “Walmart Grocery” and follow the steps to link your Walmart account to Ibotta. Add offers to your list, then shop them on grocery.walmart.com or the Walmart app. You’ll get automatic cash back within 24 hours of getting your order (after you get the “Thanks for shopping with us” email from Walmart).

Let us know how it goes!

What’s new
• Grocery retailers that offer grocery pickup and/or delivery have a new label to help you see which ones are shoppable online. Look for retailers with the “In-store & online” label.
• Now find and discover retailers more easily on category pages. From Home, scroll down to “Shop by category,” then sort by “online” “favorites” “nearby” and more.
• Improved the “Your list” ribbon at the bottom of retailer pages so that it’s a stand-out color and its contents are better organized.

What’s new
• Grocery retailers that offer grocery pickup and/or delivery have a new label to help you see which ones are shoppable online. Look for retailers with the “In-store & online” label.
• Now find and discover retailers more easily on category pages. From Home, scroll down to “Shop by category,” then sort by “online” “favorites” “nearby” and more.
• Improved the “Your list” ribbon at the bottom of retailer pages so that it’s a stand-out color and its contents are better organized.

• We’re now supporting 20 grocery retailers that offer grocery pickup and/or delivery! And we put them in a shiny new category on the home page called “Grocery pickup & delivery.” You can also spot them with an “In-store • Online” label.

We hope these changes are helping you shop smarter and safer from home. Questions? Feedback? Let us know!
Sprucing, mending, correcting, patching, and otherwise doing all the little things that make getting cash back easier, better, faster, stronger.

• There’s a new, blue “How to use Ibotta” box on the “Account” page. Tap it to make sure you’re set up to get the most cash back.
• Computer shoppers—exciting updates for you too! Head to app.ibotta.com to learn how you can get cash for online groceries from your computer.

THIS IS BIG, FAM. You can now get cash for online groceries from your phone or your computer or both! However you like you shop, Ibotta’s got you covered.
• Search for an offer in the mobile app
• Add it to your list on your computer (app.ibotta.com)
• Reference your list of offers on the Ibotta browser extension (download it from the Chrome store)
• All while browsing the grocery retailer’s website.

Retailers currently supported: Walmart Grocery, Instacart, Shipt.

What’s new
• After many months of testing and iterating, Pay with Ibotta is now available to all of you! Pay with Ibotta is a contactless way to pay using the app. Best part? You get cash back on your entire purchase — instantly.
• Switch & Save offers — the ones in the app that show you product offers with more cash back than products you recently bought — are now smarter and more punctual, so you always get the most cash back every time you shop.

What’s new
• Update on how offers work. Henceforth, you’ll need to add offers to your list to get cash back. Just tap the (+) on any offer. If you’ve been with us for a while, you’ll remember this is how offers used to work, so you’ll be a pro at it.
• Also, hey, have you tried our new online shopping experience? Add offers and check your list on your phone or computer or both(!), and get cash for online groceries at Walmart, Instacart, and Shipt. Get started in the app or at app.ibotta.com.

What’s new
• Update on how offers work. Henceforth, you’ll need to add offers to your list to get cash back. Just tap the (+) on any offer. If you’ve been with us for a while, you’ll remember this is how offers used to work, so you’ll be a pro at it.
• Also, hey, have you tried our new online shopping experience? Add offers and check your list on your phone or computer or both(!), and get cash for online groceries at Walmart, Instacart, and Shipt. Get started in the app or at app.ibotta.com.

Sprucing, mending, correcting, patching, and otherwise doing all the little things that make getting cash back easier, better, faster, stronger.

Bug fixes
• Used Pay with Ibotta, found some bugs, squashed ‘em. Now getting instant cash back is oh-so-smooth.

Bug fixes
• Used Pay with Ibotta, found some bugs, squashed ‘em. Now getting instant cash back is oh-so-smooth.

What’s new
• We are stoked to announce you can now earn on individual product offers at target.com! Link your Target account in the app to get started, then add offers to your list, and shop them online. If your Target account is already linked, just add offers and you’re good to go!

We hope this update makes you feel good about shopping and earning cash from more stores, safely and cozily from home.

What’s new
• You can now earn on individual product offers at target.com! Link your Target account in the app to get started, then add offers to your list (remember adding offers is now required to get cash back), and shop them online. If your Target account is already linked, just add offers and you’re good to go!

What’s new
• You can now earn on individual product offers at target.com! Link your Target account in the app to get started, then add offers to your list (remember adding offers is now required to get cash back), and shop them online. If your Target account is already linked, just add offers and you’re good to go!

What’s new
• We took a long, hard look at the seemingly endless-scrolling home page — kinda like the seemingly endless-scrolling 2020—and decided, CANCELLED. So now home is simplified, streamlined, easy-to-digest, and non-overwhelming. Now how to do the same with 2020…
• Also on the home page — you know that section that recommends Pay with Ibotta retailers to you? We fed it some brain juice, is a whole lot smarter now, and will show you retailers that are more personalized and useful.

Did you know you can get cash back with Ibotta from your computer too? Download the Ibotta browser extension (find us in the Chrome store) and get cash back on online shopping. We just added 150 more retailers, which brings our total to 775(!!!) websites where you can earn cash back.

What’s new
• Now you’ll know exactly how much cash back you can expect to earn from any given online retailer, when looking at a list of online retailers. Before we showed you a description of the retailer — we’re thinking you probably care more about the moolah.

What’s new
• Now you’ll know exactly how much cash back you can expect to earn from any given online retailer, when looking at a list of online retailers. Before we showed you a description of the retailer — we’re thinking you probably care more about the moolah.
Sprucing, mending, correcting, patching, and otherwise doing all the little things that make getting cash back easier, better, faster, stronger.
Sprucing, mending, correcting, patching, and otherwise doing all the little things that make getting cash back easier, better, faster, stronger.
We added some handy sorting and filtering features so that when you’re browsing retailers by category (grocery, online shopping, clothing, etc.), it’s easier to find what you want. How neat is that.

What’s new
• It’s fall!

Bug fixes
• Some of you may have had trouble manually scanning TC numbers at Walmart, namely that it would cause the app would crash. We found that bug and gave it a PSL and now everything seems to be working as expected.
Sprucing, mending, correcting, patching, and otherwise doing all the little things that make getting cash back easier, better, faster, stronger.
Sprucing, mending, correcting, patching, and otherwise doing all the little things that make getting cash back easier, better, faster, stronger.

Bug fixes
• Found and squashed a bunch of bugs related to submitting a receipt for cash. Please enjoy an average of 3.4% less frequent barcode scanning.
• “Walmart Grocery” is now “Walmart Pickup & Delivery” to match what Walmart calls their online grocery service.

Bug fixes
• Found and squashed a bunch of bugs related to submitting a receipt for cash. Please enjoy an average of 3.4% less frequent barcode scanning.
• “Walmart Grocery” is now “Walmart Pickup & Delivery” to match what Walmart calls their online grocery service.

What’s new
• Texas fam! • Say hello to cash back with grocery pickup & delivery at H-E-B. Link your H-E-B account, browse and add offers, and order your groceries at heb.com You’ll get cash back within 24 hours. It’s kinda like magic.
• We updated our loading animation and now it looks much more like it’s part of the 21st century.

Bug fixes
• Did some Halloween cleaning — clearing cobwebs, dusting off cauldrons, spiffing up the arcane coding library, you know — to the product information that powers cash back offers, and now when you use search to find products and categories, you’ll see better, more accurate results.

What’s new
• Texas fam! • Say hello to cash back with grocery pickup & delivery at H-E-B. Link your H-E-B account, browse and add offers, and order your groceries at heb.com You’ll get cash back within 24 hours. It’s kinda like magic.
• We updated our loading animation and now it looks much more like it’s part of the 21st century.

Bug fixes

• We updated our loading animation and now it looks much more like it’s part of the 21st century.

• Did some Halloween cleaning — clearing cobwebs, dusting off cauldrons, spiffing up the arcane coding library, you know — to the product information that powers cash back offers, and now when you use search to find products and categories, you’ll see better, more accurate results.

BIG NEWS! We've teamed up with Walmart to give you a FREE Thanksgiving dinner! No, really. 100% cash back on turkey, stuffing and more. So you can focus on what matters — being together, even from far away. Offers available while supplies last. Find them in the app now!

What’s new
• Pay with Ibotta is now “gift cards.” Everything else is the same — same instant cash back, same way to buy gift cards, same retailers — we just think calling them “gift cards” makes them easier to understand and use, so you can get the most cash back possible. Find them under “Shop by category” on Home.
• Also! If you haven’t checked out our 100%-cash-back Thanksgiving offers, what the heck are ya waiting for!

Find them under “Shop by category” on Home.

You know when you tap “Shop” an online (storewide) offer? It opens up a retailer’s website from Ibotta so you can shop to get cash? Yeah, that. We made some big improvements to that experience—including being able to see offer details without going back to the app—and a few more things to make getting cash with online offers easier. Which hopefully means more $$$ for you.

You know when you tap “Shop” an online (storewide) offer? It opens up a retailer’s website from Ibotta so you can shop to get cash? Yeah, that. We made some big improvements to that experience—including being able to see offer details without going back to the app—and a few more things to make getting cash with online offers easier. Which hopefully means more $$$ for you.

What’s new
• We did a bunch of behind-the-scenes work to improve the way we match products you buy to offers. What does this mean? More offers matched, more cash back for you. It’s a Christmas miracle.
Happiest holidays and jolly tidings from the Ibotta fam. Here’s to a new year of hope and more cash back than ever.
Happiest holidays and jolly tidings from the Ibotta fam. Here’s to a new year of hope and more cash back than ever.
New year, same behind-the-scenes work to give you more cash back than ever.

What’s new
• Ibotta has gone to the dark side of the color scheme — we now support Dark Mode!
• Have you tried barcode scanning? It’s the easiest way to make sure you’re getting the right products that qualify for Ibotta offers when you’re at the store. For better access to this sweet feature, we added barcode scan buttons to your list of saved offers.
Routine bug-squashing, enhancing and zhooshing to improve performance and make getting cash back better, one update at a time.
Routine bug-squashing, enhancing and zhooshing to improve performance and make getting cash back better, one update at a time.

Routine bug-squashing, enhancing and zhooshing to improve performance and make getting cash back better, one update at a time.

What’s new
• If submitting receipts for cash is your jam, this update is for you. After you tap “Redeem” from the bottom navigation bar, you pick the retailer that your receipt is from. This screen is now smarter and more intuitive to use thanks to filtering tools, better algorithms, and less irrelevant content.
Online shopping offers have a new look! They’re smaller and more streamlined, so you can see more at once — all with that same great (tasting) cash back.

Have you ever noticed that some grocery retailers, like Kroger and Safeway, require a lot of barcode scanning when you’re submitting a receipt? Pretty annoying, right? We think so too. We did a heckuva lotta back-end work to reduce the amount of barcode scanning to a little less than 40% of the time for these kinds of retailers. And we’re gonna keep working to 0% of the time, but we hope this improvement makes submitting receipts a little better for now.

Have you ever noticed that some grocery retailers, like Kroger and Safeway, require a lot of barcode scanning when you’re submitting a receipt? Pretty annoying, right? We think so too. We did a heckuva lotta back-end work to reduce the amount of barcode scanning to a little less than 40% of the time for these kinds of retailers. And we’re gonna keep working to 0% of the time, but we hope this improvement makes submitting receipts a little better for now.

What’s new
• Did you know we have widgets? 6 of them, in fact. See your current earnings, offers just for you, or bonuses all from the comfort of your home screen. From home, tap and hold on an empty space until the apps jiggle, tap the (+), search for Ibotta, and choose whichever widget suits your fancy.
Routine bug-squashing, enhancing and zhooshing to improve performance and make getting cash back better, one update at a time.
Routine bug-squashing, enhancing and zhooshing to improve performance and make getting cash back better, one update at a time.

Do you usually submit receipts to get your cash back? The latest improvement to this experience is that taking photos of your receipt is more reliable and more successful than ever. That means taking fewer photos per receipt, taking higher quality photos that are easier for us to read, and therefore your receipts are rejected less frequently.
Routine bug-squashing, enhancing and zhooshing to improve performance and make getting cash back better, one update at a time.
Routine bug-squashing, enhancing and zhooshing to improve performance and make getting cash back better, one update at a time.
Routine bug-squashing, enhancing and zhooshing to improve performance and make getting cash back better, one update at a time.
Routine bug-squashing, enhancing and zhooshing to improve performance and make getting cash back better, one update at a time.

Bug fixes
• When submitting a receipt, sometimes your pending earnings info wouldn’t show the correct pending offers and cash back amount as we process your receipt. This was super confusing and frustrating for so many of you, so we’re happy to announce this is now fixed!
• Fixed a bushel of small things like app crashes, scanning issues, and blank pages.
